resources.string: It seems that your device is offline. Please, make sure that you are connected to the Internet and try again.
An error occurred when trying to download ticker. Please, make sure you are online and try again.
… I will set the app up later.
Do you really want to skip the setup? If yes, the app will create cryptocurrencies with our random addresses and used FIAT currency will be USD.
Welcome to MoonPos, your tool for accepting payments in cryptocurrencies in an easy way!
Set up your cryptocurrencies and start using the app. You will also be able to set all the settings in preferences later.
By clicking \'Next\' you agree to our
Select cryptocurrencies for direct payments. For every selected currency you will need a public address from your wallet.
I do not wish to add another currency
You can insert or scan a QR code of your address
Waiting for payment to appear on the network
Are you sure you want to skip payment verification? The payment might not appear on the network.
Payment was registered on the network!
Oops! There was an issue with payment verification. Try it again later, please.
Prices for %s could not be fetched.

Happens after generating a QR code and confirming, that payment was sent. MoonPos will check, whether new transaction with given amount appeared on the blockchain. This allows you to prevent cheating (customer not sending the transaction).

For direct payments, payment verification is supported for BTC, LTC, DASH and ETH transactions.

If you are using convertible payments, payment verification is supported for all currencies except for Decred (DCR) and Lisk (LSK).
App created by Andrej Martinák.\n\nAnimations by Bryan Vogel,\u0020Tiago Corrêa,\u0020Darius Afchar and\u0020Jean Sala
Insert your address here or scan a QR code on the top right.
Please insert your address either by text or by scanning a QR code
Do you really want to delete this cryptocurrency from your list?

Choose your primary cryptocurrency and convert payments in other cryptocurrencies to it. This allows you to have only one cryptocurrency and accept payments in more than %s other top cryptocurrencies.
Choose your cryptocurrency and simply add your address. Payments will be sent directly to your wallet.
Choose your primary cryptocurrency. Payments accepted in other cryptocurrencies will be automatically converted to this cryptocurrency and sent to your wallet.
No cryptocurrency with name or shortcut \"%s\" found
You are already using %s as a cryptocurrency for payments. Do you want to use it for conversions?
Oops! There was an issue with downloading the list of cryptocurrencies. Try it again later, please.
• There is a minimum amount required for the transaction to carry out. Minimal amounts fluctuate depending on BTC rate.
For example, the minimum amount for conversion from %1$s is currently %2$s %3$s, which is about %4$s.
• For every conversion, there is a 1%% service fee. Direct transactions (from %1$s to %1$s) are free of charge.

• Exchange services are provided by a 3rd party - Changelly. By clicking \"I agree\" you acknowledge that you have read and agree to Changelly\'s terms of use and privacy policy and that you understand that your transaction may trigger AML/KYC verification according to Changelly\'s AML/KYC procedures. You can read more about the policy here.

• MoonPos accepts no responsibility and will not be liable for any loss or damage whatsoever suffered as a result of accessing, use of, or reliance upon Changelly\'s information and services. Changelly support can be accessed at support.changelly.com or you can send an email to support@changelly.com.
Are you sure you want to delete this convertible cryptocurrency?
There was an issue with communicating with Changelly servers. Please, try again later.
Worried about the volatility of prices?

You can choose a stablecoin as your primary convertible cryptocurrency (e.g. Dai, Tether USDT, USD coin, etc.). The value of these cryptocurrencies is tied to US Dollar, so you don\'t have to worry about sudden price drops.
I do not want to set up a convertible cryptocurrency right now.
The minimal amount for a conversion from %s is %s, which is %s %s
There was an issue with getting the minimum amount from the server. Please, try again later
There was an issue while creating convertible transaction. Please, try again later
There are no recorded convertible transactions.
Are you sure you want to remove all saved transactions? You can\'t undo this action.
Are you sure you want to remove all saved convertible transactions? You can\'t undo this action.
An error occurred when downloading %s transactions. Please, try it again later.
There was an issue downloading Changelly transactions. Please, try again later
- Dai stablecoin support\n- Nano cryptocurrency support\n- More information about payment when QR code is presented

• Added support for conversion between cryptocurrencies by third party service - Changelly. Now you can accept payments with more than %s cryptocurrencies while using only one primary cryptocurrency (wallet).

• Added support for more than 130 new FIAT currencies.

• Updated Terms and Services and Privacy Policy (both can be found in Preferences)

• Added support email to Preferences

• User Experience enhancements for tablet users
